attribute.description: Localization setting. Suported languages are: ar bg cs da de el en es fi fr he hr hu id it ja lt nb-NO nl nl-BE nl-NL no pl pt pt-BR pt-PT ro ru sk sl sv sv-SE th uk zh zh-CHT. Default language is 'en'.
attribute.name: language

attribute.description: Path relative to the server root (with the contextPath) for the tokenurl of janrain. Default is '#{request.contextPath}/j_spring_janrain_security_check' if this attribute is not provided. Must start with '/'.
attribute.name: tokenPath

attribute.description: Localization setting. Suported languages are: ar bg cs da de el en es fi fr he hr hu id it ja lt nb-NO nl nl-BE nl-NL no pl pt pt-BR pt-PT ro ru sk sl sv sv-SE th uk zh zh-CHT. Default language is 'en'.
attribute.name: language

attribute.description: Path relative to the server root (with the contextPath) for the tokenurl of janrain. Default is '#{request.contextPath}/j_spring_janrain_security_check' if this attribute is not provided. Must start with '/'.
attribute.name: tokenPath
